import React, { useState } from 'react'; function SignUp() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', age: '', phone: '', email: '', password: '', profilePic: null, }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value, files } = e.target; if (name === 'profilePic') { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: files[0] }); } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); } }; return (

Sign Up

); } export default SignUp;
